name: BattleMore
description: From battling rocket squirrels to lead zeppelins, this goofy single player RTS will keep your hands full and APM high.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 275 / ATI Radeon 4770 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 5850 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
